objects.specification: A large rectangular floor panel with a smooth, slightly glossy concrete surface in a light grey finish. It spans approximately six meters in width and four meters in depth, with a thickness of about 0.1 meters and subtly beveled edges for a refined industrial look.

A tall vertical back wall panel with a smooth, matte white plastered finish. It measures three meters in height, spans six meters in width, and has a thin thickness of 0.1 meters, providing a clean, modern backdrop.
A side wall panel with a smooth, matte white plastered finish. It is three meters tall, 4 meters deep, and 0.1 meters thick, forming the left boundary of the booth.
A side wall panel with a smooth, matte white plastered finish. It is three meters tall, 4 meters deep, and 0.1 meters thick, forming the right boundary of the booth.

A curved reception desk featuring a smooth convex curvature and high-gloss white surface, accented with natural wood trim along the front panel. The desk is about two meters long, stands one meter tall for a comfortable standing interaction, and is half a meter deep.
A minimalist rectangular pedestal display stand with a clean matte white finish. Measures one meter in width, 1.5 meters in height, and 0.5 meters in depth, ideal for showcasing products.
